title: Place an order for a platform user.

___reward_message.description: An optional message to the recipient.

___account_identifier.description: The identifier of the account for whom to place the order.

___recipient.description: The information for the person who is to receive this reward.

___email.description: The email address of the recipient.

___amount.description: The desired amount (for variable-priced SKUs) of the reward. Must be present for variable-price SKUs, must not be present for static-price SKUs.

___reward_from.description: An optional 'from name' to display to the recipient.

___sku.description: The SKU identifying the reward to be purchased.

___reward_subject.description: An optional subject line for the reward email.

___send_reward.description: Whether Tango Card should send the reward. If this is false the returned object will contain the order details. Defaults to true.
